name: Blackout Pro
description:
Are you ready for the Blackout?

The city is on the verge: it's teetering on a meltdown and you are the one controlling it. Be the mastermind in this addictive and unique game as you plunge the city into darkness in a race against the clock.

Your goal is to cause a blackout in the fastest time possible without compromising your buildings. Once the timer begins, you must swipe to eradicate light in the city.
But sinking the city into this formidable blackout isn't as easy as it may seem! Within the city also lie your strongholds, and you must navigate around them - push the darkness too far into a stronghold and it's game over. As the game progresses, strongholds will become more common and time limits will drop!

When you complete a level, you'll be awarded Bolts based on your performance - collect them to unlock achievements at various stages of the game. Share your high score through Facebook or Twitter to brag about your latest time, challenge your friends to destroy your best time on a level, and climb up the worldwide leaderboard.

This paid version of Blackout includes 30 addicting levels, beautiful graphics and social integration for hours of gameplay.

So, what are you waiting for? Be the master of the Blackout and enter the meltdown...

*********************************************

Full Version Features:

- 30 levels of fun and exciting gameplay!
- Connect with Game Center to view your level rank amongst your friends and the world!
- Race against the clock to earn Bolts!
- Earn Achievements as the game progresses!
- Stunning Graphics and amazing music!
- Share your score on Facebook or Twitter!

*********************************************

Stay updated on Facebook!
facebook.com/TheBlackoutGame

Follow us on Twitter!
twitter.com/blackout_game

Sound design and music by Timothy Bumatay
